item.title: Django’s generic relations
item.description:
This is really hot stuff.

# (Snip model creation)
>>> tiger, bear = Animal(common_name="tiger"), Animal(common_name="bear"),
>>> tiger.comparisons.create(other_obj=bear, comparative="cooler")
<Comparison: tiger is cooler than bear>
